thread.section_title: DialAFlight Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.dialaflight.com
thread.title: Violet Jenkins

author: Violet Jenkins
title: Violet Jenkins
text: I consider Conrad at DialaFlight to be the only way to book a flight that suits my wishes for a good experience when needing to travel to Australia & the US. I explain I don't want rising at unearthly hours to get to airport, I want no longer than 2hr stopovers on long haul flights, I want to arrive at a reasonable time for picking up by friends, particular seats, food requirements + advice on what visas etc needed. Conrad tries all this on my first phone call, & If he needs to investigate to fit my requests, calls me back within the hour. On top of that, he has a very cheerful & positive attitude. I would thoroughly recommend Conrad & DialaFlight for world wide travel.
